text: @NBCNews Based on the current stats on the VERY reliable Johns Hopkins CoVid19 tally site, the current worldwide death rate is 3.4% and the current US death rate is 5.2%.  Too many US administration officials (Trump) are pulling their “facts” from their lower gastrointestinal tracts.
